title: Southern Charm: Frank Lloyd Righteous
description: This week on Southern Charm, the gang heads to a Frank Lloyd Wright house to drink, capture lizards, and make fun of Craig. Just the usual stuff!
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
